About Me

Just the beginning of my coding journey...

After graduating from Binghamton University with a concentration in finance, I quickly realized I was more interested in the technology side of the business tools I wass working with. I took a leap of faith and committed to Fullstack Academy, a competitive 17-week long software immersive based in New York. When I'm not working on a project or honing my data structures & algorithm skills, I enjoy traveling, weightlifting, and spending time with my dog, Theo! Moving forward, I'm excited to bring my past experiences bolstered with my technical skills to make meaningful contributions in my next role. My full resume can be found here.
